prompts.question: Have you ever pushed someone off the stairs?
prompts.yesResponse: You helped them get to their destination faster. All it takes is a push sometimes.
prompts.noResponse: It takes a lot to not push some people off the stairs sometimes. Good work!

prompts.question: Have you ever robbed a bank?
prompts.yesResponse: Not a lot of people are as bold as you to follow their true passion
prompts.noResponse: You didn't let poverty lose your morals. Hats off to you!

prompts.question: Did you take a shower today?
prompts.yesResponse: Over 40% percent of the world does not shower everyday (some shower once in two weeks) it takes a lot of courage to face the brutal cold in the morning
prompts.noResponse: It takes a lot to stand out from the crowd. You're contributing to the earth by saving water. Keep up the good work.

prompts.question: Did you text your ex today?
prompts.yesResponse: Not everyone can try to be friends with their ex, Kudos to you
prompts.noResponse: Don't let your intrusive thoughts win. Stay toxic!

prompts.question: Have you ever eaten food that fell on the floor?
prompts.yesResponse: You've embraced the 5-second rule. Waste not, want not!
prompts.noResponse: You've avoided potential food poisoning. Smart move!

prompts.question: Have you ever lied about being sick to skip work or school?
prompts.yesResponse: Sometimes, a mental health day is just what the doctor ordered.
prompts.noResponse: You've upheld your commitment. Responsibility comes first!

prompts.question: Have you ever forgotten someone's birthday?
prompts.yesResponse: You're living in the moment, not bound by social obligations!
prompts.noResponse: You've remembered to celebrate your loved ones. That's thoughtful of you!

prompts.question: Did you procrastinate today?
prompts.yesResponse: You've mastered the art of procrastination. Productivity can wait!
prompts.noResponse: You've conquered procrastination. Stay focused!

prompts.question: Have you ever pretended to laugh at a joke you didn't find funny?

prompts.noResponse: You've stayed true to yourself. Authenticity is key!

prompts.question: Have you ever forgotten to return borrowed items?

prompts.noResponse: You've upheld your commitment to returning borrowed items. Responsible citizen!
